entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
